name: Katalina
text: Goddamn, I'm so tired of those skeletons, *domestic side eye*

name: Katalina
text: Go kill them. I really don't care about them. They murdered my family, etc...

name: Katalina
text: ... Kill some of them for me!

name: Katalina
text: ( I only added quests because they gave life to the game...

name: Katalina
text: ... but they suck. Just focus on lvling up

name: Katalina
text: Once you think are strong enough, you can try to kill some red skeletons.)
